responses.text: Take a nap first, then decide.
Have you tried barking at it?
Sometimes the best thing to do is just sit by the window and watch the world go by.
Treats first, existential crisis later.
Every problem looks smaller after a good walk around the block.
Wag first, ask questions never.
If it scares you, sniff it. Knowledge is power.
You are someone's favorite person. Don't forget that.
The vacuum is loud but temporary. This too shall pass.
Roll in the grass. Literally or metaphorically, your call.
Chase it! You might catch it this time.
Lean on someone you love. That's the whole answer.
The squirrel doesn't care what you think, and neither should you.
Find a sunny spot. Everything is clearer in the sun.
Snuggle aggressively. Assert your need for comfort.
You've survived 100% of your bad days so far. Good boy/girl.
Dig deep. The answer might be buried somewhere unexpected.
Stretch, drink water, then face the thing.
The best adventures start with someone saying 'wanna go?'
Be patient. The treat always comes eventually.
